name: phpcs
description: PHP CodeSniffer for Visual Studio Code
author: Ioannis Kappas

scripts.postinstall: cd phpcs-server && npm install && cd ../phpcs && npm install && cd ..
scripts.compile: tsc -p phpcs/tsconfig.json && cd phpcs-server && npm run installServer && cd .. && tsc -p phpcs-server/tsconfig.json
scripts.compile:server: cd phpcs-server && npm run installServer && cd .. && tsc -p phpcs-server/tsconfig.json
scripts.watch:server: cd phpcs-server && npm run installServer && cd .. && tsc -w -p phpcs-server/tsconfig.json
